name: Pro-Collagen Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm
about: What it is: A bestselling, three-in-one transformative balm that softens, nourishes, and removes makeup, daily grime, and impurities...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness..Formulation: Balm..Ingredient Callouts: Free of phthalates and mineral oil...What Else You Need to Know: The rich balm melts into a luxurious oil when gently massaged into the skin, before transforming into a hydrating milk on contact with water. The unique formula effortlessly removes long-wear makeup, daily grime and surface pollutants, and deep cleanses and softens as a facial mask...Clinical Results: In a consumer perception study with 120 subjects:.- 97% agreed this product helped remove impurities without stripping skin of moisture..In an independent user trial, results based on 120 people over 2 weeks:.- 98% agreed this product quickly and easily removes makeup, daily grime, and visible pollutants.- 97% agreed Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm left their skin feeling softened.- 92% agreed after using this product, they saw improved radiance..Highlighted Ingredients:.Original.Starflower Oil: The richest natural source of Omega-6 fatty acid Gamma-Linolenic Acid, helps smooth, soften, and nourish the skin..Elderberry Oil: A natural antioxidant, rich in essential fatty acid that smooths skin without leaving a greasy feeling..Optimega ™ Oil: A carefully balanced blend of pressed Wheatgerm and Oat oils helps reduce trans-epidermal water loss in the skin...Naked.Elderberry Oil: A natural antioxidant, rich in fatty acids that smooths skin without leaving a greasy feeling..Optimega ™ Oil: A carefully balanced blend of oils pressed in the UK: Wheatgerm and Oat, to help reduce trans-epidermal water loss in the skin..Padina Pavonica: A moisture-boosting, brown macro-algae found on the Mediterranean coast is rich in polysaccharides that quenches the skin for a visibly radiant complexion...Rose.English Rose Oleo Extract: A decadent extract that boasts skin-smoothing and hydration benefits from over 20 varieties of roses, hand harvested in the UK..Elderberry Oil: Readily absorbed and rich in essential fatty acids and natural antioxidants, supporting the skin’s smoothness, without leaving a greasy feeling..Padina Pavonica: A moisture-boosting, brown macro-algae found on the Mediterranean coast is rich in polysaccharides that quenches the skin for a visibly radiant complexion...Green Fig.Starflower Oil: The richest natural source of Omega-6 fatty acid Gamma-Linolenic Acid, helps smooth, soften, and nourish the skin..Optimega ™ Oil: A carefully balanced blend of oils pressed in the UK: Wheatgerm and Oat, to help reduce trans-epidermal water loss in the skin..Padina Pavonica A moisture-boosting, brown macro-algae found on the Mediterranean coast is rich in polysaccharides that quenches the skin for a visibly radiant complexion.
ingredients: -Padina Pavonica: Algae found on the Mediterranean coast, supports hydration..-Starflower Oil: Rich GLA source, promotes skin health by supporting its metabolism..-Elderberry Oil: High in levels of fatty acids and micronutrients—a key to healthy skin...Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, PEG-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, PEG-8 Beeswax, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Stearate, Sambucus Nigra Oil, PEG-60 Almond Glycerides, Silica, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Oil, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Wax, Glycerin, Lecithin, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Linalool, LavandulaHybrida Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Geraniol, Acacia Decurrens Flower Wax, Rosa Multiflora Flower Wax, Tocopherol, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Collagen, Limonene, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil, Fragrance (Parfum), Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Menthol, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Leaf Oil, Citral, Padina Pavonica Thallus Extract.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For makeup removal, scoop out product and gently massage onto dry skin. .-For a weekly mask, apply to skin and leave on for 10 minutes. .-Rinse with warm water or wipe off with a damp washcloth. ..Recycling Instructions:.-Rinse out any remaining product. .-Recycle jar, inner lid, and outer packaging according to local recycling guidelines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Other than the basic functions of taking off makeup and cleaning your face, this cleansing balm is a luxurious experience! If you’ve ever tried the more results-oriented cleansing balms, you’d know what I’m talking about. From the scent to the feeling of massaging the balm into the skin to how soft the skin is after rinsing the balm off, this is a sensorial experience in a jar. This isn’t my first jar and won’t be my last!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm is a luxurious, effective cleanser. I love the texture and the process of cleansing my skin at the end of the day with this product. It leaves my dry skin soft and hydrated, and I appreciate  the subtle scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this cleansing balm. I've never thought to use this before. It has a good smell so it doesn't bother me and it helps get the makeup off with no issues for me.

reviews.review_text: I tried the Elemis Pro-Collagen Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm and I loved it. After cleaning my skin was super soft!!

reviews.review_text: I love this cleansing balm. It is great at removing even the most stubborn makeup with a dime size amount. My skin is left feeling soft and supple. The scent is subtle and pleasant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love wearing makeup, but taking it off feels like such a chore. Makeup removers usually make my skin dry out without removing all of the makeup. I fell in love with the cleansing balm the first time I used it! The cleansing balm melts into the skin and removes the skin so quickly while being gentle. I have less breakouts since I started using the cleansing balm and my skin feels so radiant! This is a must have product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleansing balm is, without a doubt, another star product from the brand. The initial texture is a smooth, easy-to-handle balm that transforms into a light oil upon contact with the skin. Massaging this product into your face feels delicate and soothing—truly a delightful experience. The scent is subtle, fresh, and tropical, with hints of bergamot adding a sophisticated touch (I love that ELEMIS incorporates bergamot in many of their products!). Far from feeling greasy, the oil resembles a rich serum in texture. From the first use, you’ll notice how it softens and nourishes your skin. The product is designed to remove makeup and impurities, but it also doubles as a multifunctional balm that nourishes and revitalizes thanks to its formula enriched with botanical oils and marine extracts. For an added boost of hydration, you can even use it as a nourishing mask. After massaging it in to achieve the oily texture, remove it with a soft cloth dampened with warm water. It’s easy to wipe off, leaves no greasy residue, and leaves your skin feeling incredibly soft and ready for the rest of your skincare routine. At $68 for 3.7 oz (105 g), ELEMIS isn’t the most affordable brand, but the quality and results make it absolutely worth the splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first cleansing balm I tried that I actually liked! I tried it in the Eucalyptus scent and it smells and feels amazing. It does not leave a sticky greasy residue on my skin like the other cleansing balms I’ve tried. It washes off easily with a damp wash cloth and leaves my skin feeling hydrated, fresh, and clean. Thank you Influenster for this free gift!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the **Elemis Pro-Collagen Green Fig Cleansing Balm**! The 3-in-1 formula is everything I didn’t know I needed. It effortlessly melts away makeup, daily grime, and pollutants without stripping my skin's natural moisture. The texture transforms beautifully—from a rich balm to a silky oil and then a hydrating milk—making it feel luxurious every step of the way.    The fragrance is heavenly: a soothing blend of fig, raspberry, and bergamot that’s subtle but uplifting. My skin feels soft, hydrated, and refreshed after every use. It’s gentle yet effective, leaving no residue behind. I also love using it as a quick hydrating mask when my skin feels dry.    If you’re looking for a product that’s both indulgent and effective, this is it. Highly recommend adding this to your routine!  ---   Would you like me to adjust the tone or add anything s

reviews.review_text: Cleansing balm is an essential part of my skincare routine as it is the first and most important part to cleansing which removes all makeup and daily grime. Cleansing routine and removing makeup can feel like a chore, but this cleansing balm has enhanced my cleansing routine experience. I am totally in love with the ELEMIS Pro-Collagen Green Fig Cleansing Balm! You can smell the fresh, uplifting scent of green fig as soon as you open the jar. I love how this cleansing balm effortlessly melts from a silky balm to a nourishing oil that removes all makeup without leaving any residue behind. Truly leaves my skin feeling optimally clean, hydrated, soft and smooth after every use. This is a brand I trust as it delivers on high quality products that are effective. Additionally, I love the benefits of the natural ingredients and collagen incorporated into this luxurious cleansing balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Elemis Green Fig Cleansing Balm is a gorgeous product. I’ve been using this for several weeks and I have a consistently great experience each time. It easily removes all of my makeup, including waterproof mascara, which can be notoriously difficult. In addition to the cleansing power, the moisturized feel it leaves behind is impressive. I didn’t experience any residual product feel after use, just hydration and a clean face! The scent is fresh, lovely and combines fig, raspberry and bergamot. Best of all for a product this good, I only needed a pea-sized amount so I know it will last me awhile. It’s a winner of a cleansing balm and is a fixture in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_title: This cleansing balm smells like a spa, feels like
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Elemis Pro-Collagen Green Fig Cleansing Balm? Wow—it’s a game changer. Thanks to Elemis for sending this to me in exchange for my honest review! The quality is outstanding, with a luxurious texture that melts makeup and grime effortlessly. Honestly, it exceeded my expectations—it leaves my skin feeling clean, soft, and nourished without any tightness. Super easy to use, just massage it in, wipe with a warm cloth, and you’re good to go. The scent? Incredible. It’s a fresh, earthy green fig fragrance with a hint of sweetness—so spa-like, it’s a treat every time. My only dislike? The price is on the higher side, but honestly, it feels worth it for the results. Would I buy it again? Absolutely. And I’d 100% recommend it if you want a cleansing balm that’s effective and indulgent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The **ELEMIS Pro-Collagen Green Fig Cleansing Balm** is a luxurious, multi-tasking cleanser that effectively removes makeup and impurities while leaving skin soft, hydrated, and glowing. Its unique formula transitions from balm to oil to milk, and the limited-edition green fig scent adds a relaxing touch. Suitable for all skin types, it also doubles as a hydrating mask. While slightly pricey, its quality and performance make it worth the splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product I cannot return to any other facial cleanser. I am in love with a cleansing balm. I love the clean and hydrated feeling that I get from this bomb. I love the size of it as well. It scented like fig and it’s creamy and gel like. It removes all dirt oil and impurities and is really great for my dry skin. I highly recommend it as it doesn’t have any excess chemicals in it. It has 2000 products that are not in it for the UK standards.

reviews.review_title: Clean, smooth, softer and healthier skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Elemis Pro-Collagen Green Fig Cleansing Balm is really pampering. I usually use very exfoliating and drying cleansing products, but I am so glad to have received this during the colder months of the year. I actually love to use it as a mask before getting in the shower and letting my pores clear out. It goes on buttery and silky and you can feel its active ingredients sinking in. My skin soaks it up, rehydrates, moisturizes, and then cleans easily to a fresh sleight. I don’t use a whole lot of makeup, but I can tell you that it will remove anything you need it to. I have no problem with its light fragrance and no concerns about leaving on too long or using too often. My skin feels very soft, clean, and healthy. I love how my texture is feeling smooth, clear, and protected, rather than stripped. My pores look smaller and my skin has a nice glow. I like the ingredients, the packaging, and it is a little pricey, but I do think it’s worth it especially if you use other cleansing products, alternating. Great product and I feel the benefits after washing away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Elemis procollagen green fig cleansing balm is amazing! The smell is very refreshing and not too overwhelming and it leaves my skin way softer now than before I started using this product. I have very sensitive skin and this product does not disappoint. I use it to take off my makeup and it even takes away minor imperfections with my skin. Absolutely in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the second Elemis makeup removing balm I’ve used (the first was the pumpkin) and this one is just as effective. The fig balm is very emollient and did a great job taking off the bulk of my makeup. The scent is a bit strong, but not offensive. Great product in a two-step cleansing routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely in love with this product! So easy to use and leaves my skin feeling clean, moisturized and rejuvenated. Also has a lovely scent!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite! I love the original, but if you love scent this is for you. It still melts away makeup without stripping skin. The scent is clean and fresh, reminds me of Korres, very natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised by the experience I had with the Elemis Pro Collagen Fig Cleansing Balm. Since receiving it, I’ve been using it nonstop, and it has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine. The consistency of this balm is soft and gentle on the skin, making the application feel amazing! I only need a dime-sized amount, and once I add water, the balm transforms into a silky texture that effortlessly melts away makeup. I use this cleansing balm as the first step in my double cleansing routine, prior to my regular facial cleanser. While I’ve found that makeup balms can be a bit messy, the effectiveness of this product far outweighs that minor inconvenience. It thoroughly dissolves all traces of makeup, leaving my skin feeling clean and refreshed. I’ve made it a point to incorporate this into my daily routine, and I can say it has improved my cleansing process. If you’re looking for a cleansing balm that’s effective, gentle, and enjoyable to use, I highly recommend giving the Elemis Pro Collagen Fig Cleansing Balm a try!

reviews.review_title: Removes makeup well and leaves skin very soft.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleansing balm! I use the fig scent which smells amazing. In my evening routine, I apply it to my face without any water, and massage it into my skin. It rinses well but you must use warm water. This balm does an excellent job removing makeup and leaves my skin so soft and ready for the next steps in my skincare routine. Highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Elemis in exchange for my honest review.  The green fig scent is light and refreshing. It has more of a natural, earthy, yet slightly sweet smell. I like that it isn’t super strong or “perfume-y”. I really like this scent! Like the other Elemis Cleansing balms, this comes in a screw top container and starts as a solid creamy balm. Once you touch your fingers to it, it melts into a liquid oil form. The texture is smooth and velvety. It is easy to rub into your skin and easily removes makeup. Adding water helps emulsify the product and turns it into more of a cleanser feel. Once rinsed off it doesn’t feel oily or heavy, and leaves my face feeling clean. For my combination skin it works great, but I could see where oily skin may feel differently about cleaning balms.  The price in my opinion is very reasonable, a little bit goes a long ways, so it will actually last a while. I’d consider this a cleansing balm worth trying out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I live this rich, moisturizing cleansing balm by Elemis. Highly recommend! It gets make up off (even eye make up) without being harsh on my skin. It’s magic! It feels so good on my face…love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Elemis Pro-Collagen Green Fig Cleansing Balm, and while I absolutely love how effectively it removes makeup—even stubborn, long-wear formulas—I still prefer the original version because of its scent. The Green Fig scent is pleasant, but the original fragrance feels more luxurious and familiar to me.  That said, this balm works beautifully! It melts into a rich oil that effortlessly dissolves makeup, grime, and daily impurities without stripping my skin’s moisture. After rinsing, my skin feels soft, hydrated, and incredibly smooth. Plus, I appreciate the dual-purpose design—it doubles as a nourishing mask when I want an extra boost of hydration.  If you’re a fan of cleansing balms, this one is definitely worth trying! It delivers on its promises, leaving your skin refreshed and glowing.

reviews.review_text: The Elemis Pro-Collagen Green Fig Cleansing Balm is a luxurious skincare must-have. From the moment you open the jar, the delightful green fig scent transforms your cleansing routine into a spa-like experience. The balm effortlessly melts away makeup, dirt, and impurities, leaving skin feeling deeply cleansed yet perfectly hydrated. Its rich, velvety texture glides on smoothly and emulsifies beautifully when rinsed with water. Infused with anti-aging Pro-Collagen ingredients, it nourishes and softens the skin, improving texture and radiance after just a few uses. Suitable for all skin types, it’s the perfect indulgence for those who want effective cleansing with a touch of elegance.

reviews.review_text: I have used this Elemis Pro Collagen green fig cleansing balm for over a few weeks. I seen this  is a limited edition for the season. I have seen improvements to my face, my skin looks  hydrated and feels soft. The balm itself is creamy and thick. You need a small scoop to spread throughout your face and wash off with either warm water or a clean face towel. Your skin will look vibrant as the weather has definitely made my face so dry. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the Cleansing Balm for a few weeks now, and I’m impressed! This balm melts away makeup effortlessly – even waterproof mascara and long-wear foundation. The texture is smooth and buttery, and it transforms into a silky oil as soon as it touches the skin.  One of the best things about this product is how gentle it feels. I have sensitive skin, and many cleansers leave my face feeling dry or irritated, but this balm leaves my skin soft and hydrated. There’s no tightness or greasy residue afterward. Plus, it has a subtle, calming scent that makes my nighttime routine feel a little more luxurious.  A little goes a long way, so the jar should last quite a while. The packaging is sleek and sturdy, and it even comes with a small spatula, which keeps things hygienic.  Pros:  • Effortlessly removes stubborn makeup  • Leaves skin soft and moisturized  • Gentle on sensitive skin  • Pleasant scent and luxurious texture  Cons:  • Slightly pricey, but worth it for the quality  • Can feel a bit heavy for those with very oily skin  Overall, this is a fantastic cleansing balm that feels like a treat for the skin. Highly recommend it if you’re looking for an effective, gentle way to remove makeup at the end of the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleansing balm is nice. The jar is heavy and allows you to see how much product is left so you know when you need to replace it. It's travel friendly, if you're going away for the weekend and don't want to pack a lot of skincare. I've used it as the first step in my skincare routine as well as the second step.  You just have to make sure you wipe it all off when you use a warm cloth to remove it. It worked good to remove my sunscreen as well as my makeup looks. It didn't struggle with removing my mascara nor liquid lippie. The consistency feels like an oil that's solidified. It's not greasy and didn't break me out.  I have sensitive skin and will break out when using new products if i'm not lucky. You only have to use the smallest amount as it spreads out easily and you can work it into your skin with the minimal effort. It leaves my skin very soft when I'm done. The scent isn't overwhelming and dissipates within a minute after using it or massaging it over your face. You only need to use the smallest amount at one time. I've been using it for over a month and barely used a quarter of the jar yet. For the price if you want a balm that will remove your most stubborn makeup and last a good while, it's worth it if you have the money. I will get it again once I use up my other balms after I finish this one up.

reviews.review_title: Transform Your Cleanse: ELEMIS Pro-Collagen Balm
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a part of a free sampling program.  Here are my thoughts on the product after about a month of trying it out :   **Look and Packaging:** The ELEMIS Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm comes in a sleek, luxurious jar that exudes elegance. The packaging is a soft pastel color with a gold accent, making it a beautiful addition to any vanity. The glass jar feels substantial and high-quality, and it features a secure lid that keeps the product fresh.  **Performance:** This cleansing balm is highly effective at removing makeup, dirt, and impurities without stripping the skin. It has a delightful texture that melts effortlessly upon contact with the skin, transforming from a solid balm into a rich oil. A little goes a long way, making it a great value for its price. After use, skin feels clean, nourished, and not at all greasy.  **Formula:** The formula is enriched with a blend of essential oils and natural ingredients, including rose and chamomile, which provide soothing benefits. It’s designed to hydrate the skin while cleansing, making it suitable for all skin types, especially dry or mature skin. The balm has a pleasant, subtle fragrance that adds to the overall experience without being overpowering.  **Conclusion:** Overall, the ELEMIS Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm is a standout product in the skincare realm. Its luxurious packaging, effective performance, and nourishing formula make it a must-try for anyone looking to elevate their cleansing routine. Highly recommended for those seeking a gentle yet effective cleansing solution.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleansing balm is a real game-changer. It’s not a regular cleansing balm, it’s 3-in-1: the balm transforms into oil once it meets the warmth of your skin and when you add some water to it, it turns into milk. The formula is fantastic – it scoops easily either with a finger or a spatula. You need an almond-sized amount of the product or even less, as a little goes a long way. The balm melts very fast and glides smoothly on the skin. It also emulsifies easily, so it doesn’t take much effort to cleanse the whole face. The balm starts breaking makeup instantly, thus no rubbing or extra pressure needed.  It removes any kind of makeup, including long-lasting, with ease. While it’s extremely nourishing and moisturizing, it doesn’t leave a greasy film on my skin or eyes, which is vital for me. It also doesn’t sting or irritate the eyes. The balm washes off without a trace removing all the makeup, grease and dirt that accumulates on the face during the day. The skin looks very clean and feel very smooth afterward.  As I wear sunscreen every day and reapply it during the day, it’s important to me so that the cleanser would be able to deal with it too. And the Elemis Cleansing Balm does the job like no other. No clogged pores or breakouts have been detected after I started using it. Instead, it looks like my skin has become much clearer and more radiant. I also love to leave it on for a longer period (around 10 mins) so it works as a mask. After I take it off, the skin feels incredibly nourished, soft and pampered. Last but not least, it has a quite distinct fresh smell, I think it’s eucalyptus. Personally, I love it, as it makes the makeup removal process feel even more pleasant. This balm has become an integral part of my skincare routine and I’m not planning to switch it up for anything else.

My favorite way to use it if I have an extra minute at night is to rub it enough to start breaking down my makeup and then take a hot wet washcloth and lay it over my face. It feels and smells so relaxing and I think the heat and moisture in the washcloth help to break up the makeup. After a minute, I just wipe everything off and it leaves my skin clean and super soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: wow! I think it is an incredible product and now something essential in my routine, it feels so soft and removes my makeup super well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you like your skincare routine to feel more like a skin experience rather than a chore, definitely check this cleansing balm out as your first step. I love to take a cold napkin and remove everything in an upward motion then proceed with my normal face wash. Your skin will feel supple, soft and moisturized, not squeaky and tight.   I received this product as part of a free sampling program*, but it’s my third jar that I’ve owned now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as part of a free sampling program, but was already in love with the brand. I have very sensitive skin and scents, additives and even moisturizing elements will cause a break out or hives. Imagine my surprise when using this cleansing balm! There is scent to it but that of a relaxing essential oil scent of lavender, eucalyptus and a hint of citrus. Don't worry, the scent does not linger after removal so you can layer on any other products you need. I also wear mascaras that do not smudge or bleed so removal can be a chore. The directions caution against use around the eyes but I was able to remove my toughest mascaras with success and no eye issues. Best of all I had no break outs even after daily use and my skin felt so refreshed! I would not have purchased this on my own but now I think I've found my new best friend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've used the Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm for the second time now. Initially, I didn't quite understand the hype around it (after my first container), but since I received it for review, I decided to give it another shot. I do prefer an oil-based balm, like the one from Farmacy, for makeup removal, but this balm isn't bad. However, it does require more effort to remove makeup. It takes extra time, especially for heavier or waterproof makeup around the eyes. I've deducted one star due to the added time it adds to my routine and the price. At $69, it feels expensive, especially since the jar doesn't always come filled. Nonetheless, I like how it leaves my skin feeling hydrated and non-stripped. Overall, I would recommend this if you have the budget, but if not, more affordable options are available for makeup removal.

reviews.review_title: Luxury cleansing balm but not good for waterproof
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This one is one of my favorites that I have used before. It really feels like a luxury experience. I do think I feel my skin feels good when I use this. The scent is very herbal but I personally like it. If you order this online don’t order in summer or it will arrive melted. It does resolidify but it’s best if it’s kept in a cooler, room temperature vs a hot delivery truck in summer. I can’t rate this full stars because compared to other cleansing balms this doesn’t remove some more troublesome makeup types like waterproof eyeliner and mascara. In the photo I have some swatches: eyeliner, liquid blush, liquid highlighter, liquid eyeshadow, and a pigmented staining lipstick. I used the remover on the left side of the swatches. You can see the fully pigmented version of each swatch to the right. You can see the blush and eyeliner didn’t wipe away nearly as easily. It took more soaking and rubbing to get those off. Some other cheaper cleansing balms can remove the eyeliner and blush more easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This balm is so good!! The texture is something like i’ve never felt before. It’s more like a gel texture but it works so well! My makeup melts off so quickly and washes off my face without leaving a greasy film but not stripping or drying at all! I highly recommend this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Elemis Pro-Collagen Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm is a luxurious, effective cleanser that removes makeup and impurities while nourishing the skin. Its rich, buttery texture melts into a silky oil and transforms into a milky consistency when rinsed. Key ingredients like Padina Pavonica and elderberry oil provide hydration and anti-aging benefits. It leaves skin soft and hydrated, but some may find it too rich for oily skin, and those sensitive to fragrance should test it first. While highly praised, it comes with a higher price point.

I feel like you're paying for the pretty jar and the brand name more than the product. a simple package is fine with most of us to save on the cost! This new version is fragrance free, which I absolutely love as I have sensitive skin that agrees better with products without any scents!! This balm is very easy to use!! All you do is add a little in the palm of your hands and massage it all over your face to take off any dirt or makeup. It cleanses skin really well and even gets rid of waterproof makeup!! Since this is an oil based cleanser, I like to go with a water based cleanser after using this to really deep cleanse my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The creamy balm effectively removes makeup with just a small amount, ensuring long-lasting use. Unlike other cleansing balms, it doesn't leave any residue on the face, which is a feature I really appreciate. Overall, I absolutely adore this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Elemis Pro-Collagen Naked Cleansing Balm is a game changer in my skincare routine. The rich texture transforms into an oil that melts away heavy makeup effortlessly, then turns into a milky texture upon contact with water, rinsing away impurities without stripping my skin. The elderberry oil, combined with Optimomega™ Oil and Padina Pavonica, not only cleanses but also leaves my skin feeling soft, supple, and moisturized. It’s a genuine spa experience in a jar!

reviews.review_title: must have in my nighttime routine!

reviews.review_text: Elemis gifted me the Pro-Collagen Rose Cleansing Balm in exchange for my honest review. I had been wanting to try this balm for a while but hesitated due to two reasons: the price and the inclusion of coconut oil, which usually clogs my pores. However, this balm works beautifully on my sensitive skin. It has a strong yet lovely fragrance, which I initially thought might be an issue. After using it twice daily for two weeks, I can confidently say the scent isn't a problem. Even though I rarely wear makeup, I apply and reapply sunscreen heavily throughout the day. This balm effectively removes all of it without stripping my skin's natural oils. It feels incredibly luxurious, like a spa treatment, and it just might become a staple in my routine.

reviews.review_text: I’ve heard the claims that you need to use a cleansing balm to remove your makeup and truly care for your skin but considering how heavy they can be, I’ve been reluctant. It smelled great but there seemed to be some sort of menthol and my eyes did not react well. Thankfully the naked balm didn’t have that issue. I was amazed watching my eye makeup just melt off with the balm before I even added water. Fragrance free the balm felt gentle had nourishing on my skin; felt so moisturized and supple after use. I am a little nervous about things like this that promise to both remove makeup andddd fully cleanse your skin without an addition wash but so far seems to be living up to the promise!

reviews.review_title: Now essential in my nightly routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Having recently tried the Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm, I must say it exceeded my expectations. As a daily makeup wearer, I'm always on the lookout for products that can effectively cleanse without leaving my skin feeling dry or irritated. This cleansing balm not only effortlessly removes all traces of makeup but also leaves my skin feeling remarkably soft and nourished. What impressed me most was its ability to melt away makeup, even stubborn mascara and long wear foundation, with minimal effort. The texture is incredibly smooth and luxurious, making application a pleasure. It feels gentle yet effective on the skin, providing a thorough cleanse without stripping away essential moisture. After using the cleansing balm, my face feels deeply cleansed and refreshed, with a noticeable improvement in texture. It rinses off easily, leaving no greasy residue, which is perfect for my combination skin. The subtle botanical scent adds a spa-like touch to the experience, enhancing the overall feeling of relaxation and rejuvenation. Overall, the Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm has earned a permanent place in my skincare routine. I'm eager to explore more products from Elemis, particularly their hair oil, to complement this exceptional cleanser. If you're searching for a gentle yet effective cleansing balm that delivers on its promises, I highly recommend giving this one a try.

reviews.review_text: The ELEMIS Pro-Collagen Rose Cleansing Balm is a luxurious and multifunctional skincare product designed to cleanse, nourish, and rejuvenate the skin. This 100g balm is infused with rose and mimosa waxes, elderberry, starflower, and optimega oils, along with padina pavonica, a marine extract known for its anti-aging properties. It promises to dissolve makeup, daily grime, and pollutants, leaving the skin feeling soft, smooth, and hydrated. he ELEMIS Pro-Collagen Rose Cleansing Balm excels in performance. It effectively removes makeup, including stubborn waterproof mascara, without stripping the skin of its natural oils. The balm emulsifies beautifully with water, turning into a milky consistency that rinses off easily. Post-cleansing, the skin feels deeply cleansed, soft, and nourished, without any greasy residue. gifted by elemis

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Your makeup will melt off super fast and easily with this Elemis cleansing balm! This was gifted by Elemis, so this was my first time trying anything from Elemis. I first tried this makeup cleansing balm with an entire face was covered in rhinestones and my body was covered in paint. This cleansing balm was able to remove all the makeup, rhinestones & body paint with ease. Usually I would not be able to remove rhinestones with a cleansing balm, I would need to use spirit gum remover or micellar water to get them off, but they came off easily with this cleansing balm. My usual makeup removal routine consists of a cleansing balm, several makeup remover wipes & micellar water to remove all my makeup. This cleansing balm by Elemis literally removes everything, so you won't need any other products. When I tell you, a little goes a long way with this product, all you need is a dime to a quarter-sized amount, massage it into your face & then wipe with a microfiber face cloth, and the makeup is gone. I've tried this product again with fewer rhinestones and a full face of makeup, and it was still able to get the job done. It literally leaves behind little to no makeup. Also, it has a very light and pleasing smell, and it leaves your face with a nice glow. This product is absolutely my new go-to product in my makeup removal routine.

Using this cleansing balm was a treat for my skin, leaving it feeling refreshed and velvety smooth. Its rich texture effortlessly dissolved makeup and impurities, providing a deep cleanse without any dryness. However, I found the fragrance somewhat overwhelming, which took away from an otherwise enjoyable skincare experience. Despite this drawback, its cleansing effectiveness and skin-feel make it worth considering for those who prioritize performance over scent.

reviews.review_title: MustHave Balm for Thorough Cleansing & Nourishment
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a Sephora beauty advisor, I wear makeup daily and need a product that can thoroughly cleanse and nourish my skin. This balm is outstanding—it effortlessly dissolves makeup, daily grime, and impurities while also softening and nourishing my skin. Upon massaging it into my skin, the balm transforms into a rich oil, and with the addition of water, it turns into a hydrating milk. Its unique formula effectively removes long-wear makeup and surface pollutants, making double cleansing unnecessary. After using it, there’s barely any residue left when I towel dry my face. My skin feels incredibly clean, hydrated, and moisturized without any dryness. It also deep cleanses and softens the skin, doubling as a facial mask. For anyone seeking a luxurious and effective cleansing experience, I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_text: If you’re on the hunt for the ultimate skincare hero, look no further than the Elemis Cleansing Balm. this balm has quickly become a staple in my beauty routine, and here's why. First off, let’s talk texture. This balm is unbelievably smooth—think of the softest, creamiest butter you’ve ever encountered. Applying it feels like giving your face a luxurious treat every time. And the best part? It's completely odorless! If you're someone who prefers unscented products, you’ll absolutely love this. Now, onto the real magic: makeup removal. This balm tackles even the most stubborn waterproof mascara with ease. No tugging, no scrubbing, and—most importantly—no burning eyes! Yes, you heard that right. Your eyes will be thanking you. And here's the kicker: no waxy film. After rinsing it off, my skin feels fresh, clean, and wonderfully soft. It’s like hitting the reset button on your face. In short, the Elemis Cleansing Balm is a must-have. It’s smooth, effective, and gentle—everything you could ask for in a cleanser. So do yourself a favor and give it a try. You won’t be disappointed!

reviews.review_title: Elemis Pro-Collagen Naked Cleansing Balm Delivers!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hey everyone, I've been loving the Elemis Pro-Collagen Naked Cleansing Balm, Limited Edition, and I'm excited to share my experience. Just to be transparent, I received this product in exchange for this post. My thoughts are entirely my own.  This fragrance-free iteration of their bestselling cleanser is a total game-changer. It effortlessly dissolves makeup and impurities, leaving my skin positively glowing. What makes it stand out is its innovative 3-in-1 formula—it acts as a nourishing balm, a thorough cleansing oil, and a hydrating milk all in one application. It's like having a spa treatment at home!  Despite its deep-cleansing power, it's remarkably gentle. It tackles stubborn waterproof mascara and liquid lipsticks without causing any irritation or drying out my skin. Instead, my skin feels incredibly soft and moisturized after each use.  Infused with moisturizing oils rich in fatty acids, it not only cleanses deeply but also smooths out fine lines and wrinkles, giving my complexion a youthful radiance. It's no wonder it's received such high praise—97% of users agree it effortlessly removes makeup and daily grime, while 92% experienced increased suppleness, and 93% noticed a more radiant complexion.  If you're looking for a cleanser that not only meets but exceeds expectations, leaving your skin looking and feeling fantastic, this one's definitely worth adding to your skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm absolutely thrilled with the Elemis Pro-Collagen Naked Cleansing Balm! As someone with sensitive skin, I've struggled to find a cleanser that effectively removes makeup and impurities without irritating my skin. This fragrance-free version of the iconic Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm has been a revelation. *Key Benefits:* - *Gentle yet effective:* Melts away makeup and grime without stripping my skin of its natural oils. - *Nourishing ingredients:* Packed with Elderberry, Optimega, and Starflower oil, and Padina Pavonica, which leave my skin feeling soft, hydrated, and glowing. - *Three-in-one texture:* Transforms from a rich balm to a luxurious oil and then a hydrating milk, making it a joy to use. - *Suitable for sensitive skin:* Fragrance-free and ophthalmologist-tested, making it perfect for use around the eyes and on sensitive skin. *Results:* - *Soft and supple skin:* After using this cleanser, my skin feels incredibly soft and supple. - *Improved radiance:* My skin looks brighter and more even-toned, with a beautiful glow. - *Reduced irritation:* No more redness or irritation, even when using it around my delicate eye area. *Recommendation:* If you're looking for a gentle yet effective cleanser that's suitable for sensitive skin, look no further than the Elemis Pro-Collagen Naked Cleansing Balm. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: lright, I’ve been holding off on this review because I wanted to see how things went after a few days and a full face of makeup.  First off, I was totally bracing myself for a blast of fragrance when I opened the package. Guess what? Nada. Unlike most of Elemis’ products, the Naked Cleanser truly lives up to its name with zero added fragrance. My nose and skin are both doing a happy dance—no irritation here!  Now, let’s talk texture. It’s a balm, kind of like a thin, meltable Vaseline. Pro tip: don’t do what I did and slap it on like you’re icing a cake. A little goes a long way!  On my first try, I smeared it on my face, added a splash of water, and it turned into a milky, cleansing wonder. Think oil cleanser, but better.  It easily wiped away the day’s grime on my no-makeup face, so naturally, I put it to the ultimate test the next day: a full face of makeup. And let me tell you, this stuff is now my holy grail. It just melts the makeup right off like magic.  In summary, this cleanser is a gem. No added fragrance, leaving your skin fresh and irritation-free, ready for whatever skincare concoctions you’ve got lined up next. Whether you use it as a first cleanse in a multi-step routine or as your main squeeze, it’ll slide right into your regimen with no fuss.

I was gifted by Elemis to test out this cleanser. This worked very well with removing my makeup and works extremely well on sensitive skin. Doesn’t leave any residue even from waterproof makeup. Recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I normally struggle to get all of my makeup off especially in the summer heat, but I was incredibly impressed with how easily all of my makeup was removed using this cleansing balm. I normally have to use a makeup wipe and wash my face twice with my face wash but now I truly only need this and an extra rinse! A washcloth pairs perfectly with this balm, 10/10 recommend. It easy to use and does exactly what i need it to do while keeping my skin sooooo soft. This product was gifted by elemis, and I will be repurchasing on my own because it’s just that good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time using a cleansing balm and I will say that I was pleasantly surprised. In my opinion the biggest pros of this product are how thoroughly it cleanses with a small amount of product and that it leaves your skin feeling soft and hydrated afterwards. However, it did take more effort and time than my usual makeup remover. I would buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such an amazing product! This cleansing bomb feels so nice on my skin and takes off all of my make up with such ease. I love the scent and how easily it cleans my skin. Would recommend this to a friend. Gifted by Elemis

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received this Pro-Collagen Naked Cleansing Balm from Elemis and it works really good. When I first applied it I wasn’t too sure how much to put to take off my makeup. However, you only need a small amount because it really takes off everything. I used a washcloth to take off my makeup and it literally took off everything. You really don’t need to cleanse your face after because this takes it all off. This leaves my face feeling so smooth, hydrated, and glowy after. The texture of the product is milky like and so soft. Also, it does have a nice scent to it, that isn’t too overwhelming when applied. Overall, this is a great cleansing balm and such a nice texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ten out of ten slay cleanser!! this takes off all my makeup including my mascara which is always a struggle with me lol. i totally recommend trying this balm out! gifted by elemis (the best!!!!) i love

reviews.review_title: It's my mini spa treatment daily
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: **Customer Review:**  I've been using the Elemis Pro-Collagen Naked Cleansing Balm, and it's been a fantastic addition to my skincare routine. My skin is quite sensitive, so finding a cleanser that doesn't irritate has always been a challenge. This unscented version is perfect! The balm feels rich and luxurious, melting into an oil as I massage it in, and then turning into a hydrating milk with water. It removes my stubborn makeup and daily grime effortlessly. My skin feels deeply cleansed, soft, and hydrated afterward. If you're looking for a gentle yet effective cleanser that won't irritate sensitive skin, I highly recommend giving this one a try. It's like having a mini spa experience every day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleansing balm has really helped my skin. I have sensitive oily skin and surprisingly doesn’t break me out. I haven’t had a break out since using it. I have hormonal acne as well. A little goes a long way. Gifted by Elemis.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by Elemis and is a standout in my skincare routine. Its rich texture melts into a silky oil, effortlessly removing makeup and impurities. When water is added, it transforms into a hydrating milk, making it easy to rinse off. The light English Rose scent adds a calming touch. This balm leaves my skin feeling soft, nourished, and radiant, without any dryness. Key ingredients like Elderberry Oil and Padina Pavonica keep my skin hydrated and smooth. The balm's consistency is perfect for easy application and a thorough, luxurious cleanse. Highly recommended for anyone seeking an effective and indulgent cleanser.

reviews.review_text: I am so glad that I was able to find a cleansing balm that melted my make up right off! Taking off my make up has always been annoying, but this made it so easy! Not only was a great for my sensitive skin, but it also left my skin super hydrated after using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying out the Elemis Pro-Collagen Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm, and let me just say, it exceeded all my expectations. This bestselling balm is truly a game-changer when it comes to skincare.  The moment I applied the balm onto my skin, I was met with a rich and luxurious texture that instantly melted into a velvety oil. The sensation was incredibly soothing and comforting. As I gently massaged it in, I could feel it effortlessly dissolve away all traces of makeup, daily grime, and impurities, leaving my skin clean and refreshed.  But the magic didn't stop there. When I added a little water, the balm transformed into a hydrating milk, creating a delightful cleansing experience. It rinsed off easily, leaving behind no residue or greasy feeling. My skin felt incredibly soft, smooth, and nourished.  What truly impressed me about this cleansing balm is its versatility. It not only removes makeup and cleanses the skin but also doubles as a rejuvenating facial mask. I love how it deeply cleanses and softens my skin, giving it a revitalized and youthful appearance.  I can confidently say that the Elemis Pro-Collagen Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm has become an essential part of my skincare routine. Its transformative formula and luxurious feel make it a joy to use, and the results speak for themselves. If you're looking for a multi-purpose cleansing balm that delivers on its promises, look no further. This product is a must-have for anyone who wants to achieve a clean, nourished, and radiant complexion.

Elemis sent me the Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm to try, and I’m really impressed. This balm starts as a rich texture and transforms into a luxurious oil, then into a hydrating milk when water is added. It’s like a mini spa experience every time. Overall, the Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm is a must-try for anyone seeking an effective, luxurious cleanser. It pairs well with other Elemis products and leaves your skin feeling incredible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Details: As with their pro-collagen balm, the rose version is formulated to be a 3-in-1 that softens, nourishes, & removes makeup, daily grime, & impurities. Created to change from a balm to an oil & then a hydrating milk once water makes contact with it. Key ingredients include English Rose Oleo Extract: (smooths & hydrates skin), Elderberry Oil (contains fatty acids & antioxidants), & Padina Pavonica (moisturizes & adds radiance to skin).    My experience: I have combination-oily, acne prone, sensitive skin. I’ve been using this nightly for two weeks. It’s a yellow balm with a delightful rose scent that when applied to your skin it becomes a slippery oil that visibly melts away makeup in front of your eyes. It doesn’t leave any residue behind & is easy to wash off. Leaves my skin soft, moisturized & clean with makeup removed. I LOVE the rose scent more than the original herbal scent & will be repurchasing.   Overall: I absolutely love the rose version of this cult classic collagen cleansing balm. The rose scent is delightful & the balm leaves my skin cleansed, moisturized, & soft. I will be repurchasing soon. 5.0/5.0

reviews.review_text: This cleansing balm takes off all my makeup, and I like to wear a full face. It feels very gentle on the skin and does not cause acne. I stayed away from cleansing balms because I was scared of it clogging my pores or making my skin oiler, but this has worked fanatic! It really makes taking off my makeup so much easier and faster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I truly like this cleansing balm and it works just as it was described. This works amazing. Takes off all your makeup including waterproof mascara. Washes off clean and skin feels soft and hydrated. My pores have reduced. My face feels soft and cleansed. The best! gifted by Elemis

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Elemis. The Elemis Pro-Collagen Rose Cleansing Balm is a luxurious skincare treat. It comes in a pretty pink jar with a spatula for easy use. The buttery balm melts into an oil, removing makeup and dirt effortlessly. It smells like real roses, making cleansing feel like a spa experience. Packed with nourishing and anti-aging ingredients, it leaves my skin soft and hydrated. Though it's pricier, it works as a cleanser, mask, and overnight treatment, making it worth it. Perfect for all skin types, even sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I live for a good makeup removing balm and the Pro Collagen Cleansing Balm by Elemis has become a favorite. I apply a quarter size amount in my hands and rub them together them I rub my hands on my face and my makeup melts away instantly.  It feels amazing and leaves my face feeling light and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So I’ve been using this cleansing balm for a little while now and I really like it. It glides on smoothly on the face and when you wash it off your skin feels super hydrated and ready for your face wash. Would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love cleansing balm it removes my make up so easily without irritating my skin! It hydrates it as well it is not drying to my skin. I do have sensitive skin but this is so nice to the skin very hydrating as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much. This product has helped my skin health in many ways and I feel like my acne and my texture in my skin has cleared up. I love that this product does not irritate my eyes when I apply it and I can fully open my eyes while doing my skincare. Gifted by Elemis.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Elemis' Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm 100g is the first facial cleanser that provides me with truly cleansed skin.  Gentle on skin and easy to rinse off, it cleanses waterproof makeup with ease.  I cannot recommend this enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a fan of this cleansing balm. It’s gentle on my skin but still effectively cleans and removes makeup. Leaves skin hydrated rather than dry. The texture is light and not heavy. It wipes off easily and takes the dirt with it. Smells great…like high end spa. This has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary in exchange for my review. This is one of my favorite cleansing balms.It does a great job of removing all of my makeup. You do not have to use a lot of this product because a little bit goes a long way. I also like that it is gentle on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleansing balm is the best. I’ve used a smaller  size container before and instantly fell in love! It’s so easy at night to take off your makeup and any dirt and oil from the day. Love it! Great for sensitive skin too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Truly easy to glide across the skin and remove the end of the debris and make up easily without irritating the skin. This product makes it super easy to enjoy an at home spa experience. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am completely obsessed with the Elemis Cleansing Balm! It is the fastest and most effective way to remove my makeup while also cleansing my face. I love the feel and texture of it. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleansing balm is sooooo good. I use it to remove my makeup and deep cleanse my face. It literally gets everythinggg off. It definitely has a strong smell if you are sensitive to smells they may not love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the original formula of this cleansing balm for a couple of years now and this one was gifted by Elemis for my review. Both versions work wonders at removing my mascara! A small amount goes a long way! If you are not seeing results, make sure you are applying to dry skin, then adding just a bit of warm water to create a milky cream. When done, wipe it off with a warm, damp cloth to remove any remaining makeup. Sometimes I follow up with a foaming face wash or exfoliating scrub, while other times I am happy with just using this cleanser. It leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth without being greasy or drying out my skin. If I had to choose between the rose-scented version and the original, I would opt for the original as scented products can sometimes cause slight irritation. I did not encounter any significant issues with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many cleansing balms and this is in my top 5 favs! You only need a little and it removes sooo much. I typically wear full coverage makeup and this literally removes everything with the tiniest amount. I have very sensitive skin and this did not make me break out either!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Im no longer using anything to take off my makeup at the end of the day other than this product! I’ve found other balms never seem to get rid of everything including waterproof mascara and this does the trick perfect! Gifted by elemis

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite cleansing balm! Its scent is not too much and cleans all of my makeup off so easily, even my waterproof makeup! I received this item for free in exchange for a review. Gifted by Elemis

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Elemis, I was truly impressed with the product. It made my skin feel incredibly fresh and smooth. I would rate it a perfect 10 and highly recommend it to others. After sharing it with my friend, she loved it as well. I look forward to future collaborations. It was an exceptional experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: gifted by elemis i absolutely love how hydrating and moisturizing this cleansing balm is and its great for taking off a full face of makeup without feeling thick or oily. this is a great product and makes my skin refreshed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a fan of Elemis for the longest and could not wait to try the pro-collagen cleansing bomb. It is the perfect first step in my cleansing routine. I like to use this to double cleanse. It breaks down my makeup so easily especially the stubborn waterproof mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Elemis Pro Collagen Cleansing Balm in exchange for my review. I honestly didn’t expect much of the product but when I tell you it’s my new fave cleanser and makeup remover! It’s so creamy and melts in my hand. The smell reminds me of my spa treatment in Turks & Caicos. I used it when I had red matte lipstick because I wanted to see if it did what it said it would do and baby it didn’t disappoint! Unlike other cleansers where you wash of with water, you remove the balm with a warm damp cloth—-I swear it’ll feel like you just had a facial! Definitely top 2 in my skin cleansing arsenal and it ain’t number two!

reviews.review_title: It melts my makeup in a second

reviews.review_text: I like this balm because it doesn't dry out or tighten my skin at all. After using it, I don't feel the need to apply more moisturizer immediately. It leaves my skin feeling soft and nourished.  I appreciate its composition, consistency, and relaxing aroma, as well as its high-quality skin-cleansing properties.

reviews.review_text: Make up melts away with this. Not for the oily girls though would say its for more mature skin. My mom loves it as she's low maintenance so something like a cleansing balm is great for removing make up and also hydrating. gifted by elemis

reviews.review_text: I received this product from Skeepers in exchange honest product review   The Experience Texture Journey:The balm starts as a rich, luxurious solid.Upon massaging it into your skin, it melts into a silky oil.Add water, and it transforms into a hydrating milk.Effective Makeup Removal:Say goodbye to stubborn makeup, daily grime, and surface pollutants.It effortlessly dissolves long-wear makeup, leaving your skin fresh and clean.Nourishing Ingredients:Elderberry, Optimega™, and Bee Friendly Starflower oil provide deep hydration.Superhero algae Padina Pavonica supports soft, glowing skin.Aromatherapy Bonus:The blend of 9 essential oils (Lavender, Chamomile, Eucalyptus) invigorates your senses.Imagine a mini spa experience at home!

reviews.review_text: I honestly LOVED this product. The texture is such a buttery feeling & then once applying it to your face it feels so nice on the skin. I also really liked the smell as well. Another great factor of this product is that a little goes a long way, I’ve felt with other cleansers I’ve had to use multiple rinses to wash away dirt or makeup, or even just feel clean. However, this product gets the job done in one rinse & made me feel beyond clean immediately after, while also giving me a subtle glow. Most of all though, my skin felt so hydrated - which is hard for me to feel, especially after only using a cleanser, considering I have such dry skin. I cannot recommend this product enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the Elemis Pro-Collagen Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm for a few weeks now, and I am thrilled with how well it works. This cleansing balm is a game-changer in my nightly skincare routine. The balm itself has a rich, luxurious feel that quickly melts into an oil when applied to the skin. It effectively dissolves all my makeup, even waterproof eyeliner and mascara, without any harsh scrubbing. The scent is light and soothing, making the cleansing process feel like a mini spa treatment. What I appreciate most about this product is how my skin feels after using it. It leaves my face feeling clean, soft, and hydrated, without any greasy residue. I’ve noticed my skin looks more radiant and feels more supple since I started using it. Plus, it’s gentle enough that it hasn’t caused any breakouts or irritation, which is often a concern for my combination skin. The packaging is elegant and practical, with a secure lid that keeps the balm fresh. A little goes a long way, so the jar lasts quite a while, making it a good value for the price. Overall, the Elemis Pro-Collagen Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm has become a staple in my skincare routine. It’s effective, luxurious, and leaves my skin looking and feeling fantastic. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: A must in your skincare routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying out the Elemis Pro-Collagen Rose Cleansing Balm gifted to me by skeepers! I must say, it has been a game-changer in my skincare routine. Texture and Application: The balm has a rich, luxurious texture that melts effortlessly into the skin. Upon application, it transforms into a silky oil that glides over the face, making it easy to massage and remove makeup and impurities. The product comes with a soft cleansing cloth, which adds a gentle exfoliating step to the routine. Fragrance: One of the standout features of this cleansing balm is its divine rose scent. It’s subtle and not overpowering, providing a calming, spa-like experience every time I use it. The fragrance is derived from English Rose Oleo Extract, which adds to its natural and soothing appeal. Performance: In terms of performance, the Elemis Pro-Collagen Rose Cleansing Balm excels. It effectively removes even the most stubborn makeup, including waterproof mascara, without stripping the skin of its natural oils. After use, my skin feels deeply cleansed, soft, and hydrated. There’s no greasy residue left behind, which is a major plus. Ingredients: This balm is formulated with a blend of rose and mimosa waxes, elderberry, starflower, and optimega oils. These ingredients work together to nourish and hydrate the skin while cleansing. Additionally, it contains anti-aging properties, thanks to the inclusion of Padina Pavonica, a powerful marine extract known for its collagen-boosting benefits. Value for Money: While the Elemis Pro-Collagen Rose Cleansing Balm is on the pricier side, I believe it’s worth the investment. The quality of the ingredients, combined with the luxurious experience it offers, makes it a standout product in the realm of skincare. A little goes a long way, so a single jar lasts quite a while. Final Thoughts: Overall, the Elemis Pro-Collagen Rose Cleansing Balm is a must-try for anyone looking to elevate their cleansing routine. It’s perfect for all skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Elemis. All thoughts and opinions are my own.  The Elemis Pro-Collagen Rose Cleansing Balm is an exceptional addition to any skincare routine, offering a trifecta of benefits: hydrating, soothing, and cleansing. From the first use, it’s clear this balm is a lovely product, with a delicate rose scent that transforms a mundane task into a pampering ritual. Formulated with a trio of nourishing plant oils—Elderberry, Optimega™, and Bee Friendly Starflower oil—this balm provides an intense hydration boost. These oils work together to deeply moisturize the skin, leaving it feeling soft and supple. The addition of Padina Pavonica, a powerful algae extract, may promote skin elasticity and a youthful glow. The balm’s texture is rich and velvety, melting into a silky oil upon application. It effortlessly dissolves makeup and impurities, ensuring a thorough yet gentle cleanse. Unlike many cleansers that can leave skin feeling tight and dry, this balm remains hydrated and nourished. The balm is easy to remove with either water or a warm cloth, and it leaves no greasy residue, only a smooth, radiant complexion. Overall, the Elemis Pro-Collagen Rose Cleansing Balm is a top-tier skincare product that lives up to its promises. It delivers a soft, hydrated, and glowing complexion. Though it comes with a premium price tag, the results and experience it offers make it a worthy investment for those seeking luxurious and effective skincare.

reviews.review_text: This cleansing balm is like a spa in a tub. It smells so luxurious and feels so soothing on the skin. It melts away makeup and impurities perfectly. Ive used it every night for weeks and I’m not even 1/4 through the jar.

reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Elemis in exchange for my honest review, I've used this cleansing balm for just over a week now, and have really liked it! The balm melts into your skin, and after rinsing, leaves skin feeling soft & clean. Will definitely continue to use.
