reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for years! I love how easily it takes off makeup especially eye area without any irritation. It is the most amazing first step to remove anything off your face and leaves your skin so soft!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from elemis. This cleansing bomb is very lovely and I love the fact that it is a rose scented one. I never have to use a lot when I use this balm to go ahead and take off my makeup with a cloth. This is very easy to use in the texture is very smooth and kind of soft and velvety like. This takes up my makeup very well after just a few caresses to the face. Overall I don't really like to use this bomb and will continue to use it as I love how afterwards my skin feels soft and looks hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleansing balm if very effective and gentle. I love how it removes all of my makeup and doesn't strip the skin. It has a nice fresh scent that smells like a spa. I had used this years ago and am glad to have it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love using a cleansing balm prior to my face wash and the Elemis cleansing balm feels really nice on the skin. It does a great job at removing all of my makeup. I like to pair it with the Elemis midnight superfood facial too. I did dock a star because of the heavy scent, but overall I really enjoy the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only cleansing balm that doesn’t break me out afterwards! I love how the formula is non greasy and doesn’t clog pores. After using, your skin feels clean and moisturized. I will definitely be buying again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I adore the Elemis Pro-Collagen Rose Cleansing Balm 100g. It effortlessly removes all my makeup, and I simply wipe it off with a washcloth. It's very user-friendly and has a wonderful fragrance. I also use it to gua-sha my face! Gifted by Elemis.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The texture of this cleansing balm is rich and creamy. It smells amazing too without it being too overwhelming. It melted my spf and makeup right off! As someone who has sensitive skin and perioral dermatitis this wasn't irritating at all and I did not flare up. *gifted by elemis.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this product is more of a gel than a hard balm. When applied it melts but it doesn’t become too runny when rubbing it in. I decided to try it out as the nourishing treatment like the bottom of the jar suggested and left it on for about 5 mins. It was so easy to remove with just a couple swipes of a warm cloth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love with the Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm! This balm is pure magic in a jar—it melts away all my makeup and impurities effortlessly, leaving my skin feeling incredibly clean, soft, and nourished. The luxurious texture and divine scent make my cleansing routine feel like a spa experience every single time. It's perfect for all skin types and has done wonders for my complexion, making it look more radiant and youthful. If you want a cleanser that not only deeply cleanses but also pampers your skin, you need to try this balm. Trust me, it's a game-changer!

I absolutely love the Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleaning balm. The texture is so smooth and easy to apply. Instantly it removes all your makeup without residue! I am so excited to have been gifted such an amazing product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell of this is honestly the best part. Very herbal and clean. It is super smooth and thick and as someone who can have acne-prone skin that generally makes me nervous but this balm has only done wonders for my skin. Does an  excellent job at removing face and eye makeup and comes off completely clean with a second cleanse. I am definitely a convert.

reviews.review_title: Obsessed with the Pro-Collagen Rose Cleansing Balm
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Elemis. The rich, smooth texture melts into a silky oil on my skin, transforming my cleansing routine into a spa-like experience. It's incredibly soothing and luxurious. Super easy to use—just warm a small amount between your fingers, massage onto dry skin, and rinse off. It effortlessly removes all makeup, including waterproof mascara, without leaving any residue. This balm does wonders for my skin, leaving it feeling soft, hydrated, and deeply cleansed. It's gentle yet highly effective, making my skin look radiant and healthy. The delicate rose scent is absolutely divine and not overpowering. It adds a calming touch to my routine, especially after a long day. The elegant jar comes with a spatula, which I love for hygienic application. It looks great on my vanity too! Highly recommend for anyone looking to elevate their skincare routine! 💖

I really like how this does a great job at removing all of my makeup, even the most stubborn waterproof products. It doesn’t have a strong scent which I appreciate. It leaves my skin hydrated but not greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Personally, I found the Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm to be gentle yet thorough in its cleansing action. It not only removed my makeup effortlessly but also left my skin feeling incredibly soft and nourished. I particularly enjoyed using it as a facial mask occasionally, allowing its hydrating properties to sink in for a deeper treatment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this balm and will keep repurchasing. I've a been a fan of Elemis for years and this is my favorite one to remove makeup and clean my skin. The texture is creamy but light and skin feels immediately fresh and ready for other products to be applied. Amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleansing balm doesn’t strip my skin from its natural oils. It’s rich and creamy from the collagen and effectively removes all my eye makeup! And the rose scent is lovely with a touch of sweetness. It removes all of my heavy duty eye makeup effortlessly leaving no residue. It doesn’t strip my skin of its oils and my face still feels hydrated afterwards. Gifted by Elemis.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was offered by elemis! I get more excited about my skincare routine now. I love how clean my skin feels and how fresh it feels after. It removed makeup, and helps clear up my pores so they aren’t as clogged. I also LOVE the smell. It’s a nice texture and feels amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser balm  it’s amazing, it’s my best feeling at this time. I’m sensitive skin I could not be happier with my results, because I feel my skin so smooth in the all day. the product exceeded my expectations. I want to try more of this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Elemis Pro-Collagen Naked Cleansing Balm, and it's fantastic! The texture is rich and luxurious, melting effortlessly into the skin to remove makeup and impurities. It leaves my skin feeling deeply cleansed, soft, and hydrated without any greasy residue. Perfect for a thorough yet gentle cleanse! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping to find a baldamo that melts makeup effectively, I love this one like other elemis products that doesn't have such a strong smell. I always wear makeup and this balm removes makeup very well. I recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. It is gentle on skin gets makeup right off, super easy to use , love the results and smells amazing . Clean and radiant skin. Highly recommend giving this awesome product a try. *gifted by Elemis

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This balm was gifted by Elemis!! It has a great rose smell and not oily at all.  Removing all my eye makeup without irritating my eyes! Which is great because my eyes are very sensitive.  I would recommend this product and purchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re looking for an easy to use product to take your makeup off and leave your face clean, the Elemis cleansing balm is perfect. I love how it makes my skin feel and the smell is light and really nice.

reviews.review_text: I love Elemis and all their skincare products but this cleansing balm is literally the greatest one on the market! From even the size of the product to the consistency of the balm, it is phenomenal and melts away any makeup !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was great for removing my waterproof mascara and other makeup. I love the packaging, and I think it smells really good without being overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this cleansing balm last night to take off my full face of makeup & It got everything off so easily. It left my face feeling soft & hydrated! This is my new favorite cleansing balm. I love the texture of it & I’m loving the results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Combination skin

How amazing is it that I can use it as a mask also!

It’s even good at getting the makeup off without making my eyes burn or getting blurry like other products have for me in the past. Really happy with this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i have always been a fan of elemis products! it has never been easier to remove my makeup than when i am using this balm. the texture is very smooth and cleanses your face easily. i will always recommend this product to anyone who asks which cleansing balm to use!! *this product was gifted by elemis*

reviews.review_text: The cleansing balm is very good at removing makeup and cleansing the whole face. I like that it doesn’t feel greasy on my skin. The only downside is the rose floral scent is strong, so if you have sensitive skin, just be awake or that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m loving this cleansing balm to remove makeup, it’s extremely moisturizing and glides on the skin.  It doesn’t leave any greasy residue behind and does a great job removing makeup.  I have super sensitive skin and it didn’t irritate my skin at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I now use this every night ! It’s the best cleansing balm ! It doesn’t strip my skin or make it feel dry. I love how it’s also unscented. I prefer most of my products to be like that. Overall this is the best and removes all my makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have wanted this for such a long time and I heard amazing things but there are only so many products that I can honestly say that everyone needs to try once in their life and this is one of them. The insane part about that is that I hate any product scented like rose and this is heavily fragrance. If this was offered in fragrance free version, I would lose my mind over it but as a product I stand behind it because it is that amazing and it needs to be experienced by everyone at least once. The texture, the melt, the viscosity, the cleanse, the radiance, and the softness of this is what we all need. I received this complimentary from Elemis in exchange for my honest opinion and I love it but I highly suggest a fragrance free cleansing balm for the future.

I’ve just begun using this product and really like the formula so far. It’s very soft on the skin with a hydrating finish, perfect for a second cleanser. I’m curious to see how my skin is doing within the next couple of weeks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My sensitive skin loves this product! I am very picky about how I remove my makeup (I hate makeup wipes & micellar water) & sometimes finding a good product to remove makeup + add good things to your skincare routine is hard. This is a product I would absolutely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Pro-Collagen Rose Cleansing Balm is delivers a really luxurious cleansing experience. It has a firm yet squishy balm texture that quickly melts into the skin. I like how this emulsifies quickly and does not leave a weird oily film on my skin like other cleansing balms do. I received this complimentary from Elemis (for free) in exchange for honest review. While I enjoyed the experience of using this I don't think I would repurchase due to the high price point and other options available on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is excellent for your skin, it helps with wrinkles and it also has sunscreen which makes it more interesting. I like to apply it under my makeup and when I go out I do exercise since it cares for and protects my skin.Gifted by Elemis

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ummmmmm water proof mascara removing wizard??? I actually have not found a cleansing balm that takes off my makeup this well, like ever. All of my friends are also now hooked on this, it’s that good. It smells so lovely and feels so luxurious and my skin feels squeaky clean!!

reviews.review_title: Doesn’t break out my acne-prone skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From the moment I opened the jar, I was greeted with a subtle, fragrance that made my skincare routine feel like a spa experience. The balm itself has a luxurious, buttery consistency that melts effortlessly into the skin, effectively dissolving makeup, dirt, impurities. What I love most is how gentle yet thorough the cleansing feels. My skin tends to be quite sensitive, but the Elemis Cleansing Balm left it feeling soft, nourished, and never stripped of its natural oils. After rinsing, my complexion looks fresh and radiant, with no greasy residue left behind. I have acne-prone and sensitive skin- so I love this doesn’t break me out. It’s my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this cleansing balm by Elemis. The way it just melts off the makeup is amazing. Followed by their gentle resurfacing cleanser makes my skin feel super clean and i know i got all the product off.

reviews.review_text: Used this for the first time yesterday, I really liked this product. At first I wasn’t sure how to use it, but you simply use it on a dry face. It feels like your makeup gets melted off. I do recommend

The only downside is that I keep it in my shower, because thats when I wash my makeup off and the tub-style container is large so it gets water in it. I’d prefer a different type of dispenser. Gifted by elemis

reviews.review_text: I am in love with this cleansing balm , I've emptied multiple tubs of it ! First off the texture is so soft and melts everything away and emulsifies so beautifully! It's truly amazing and it smells like a spa ! I love it and will always have it in my lineup !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: HOLY GRAIL CLEANSING BALM!! This is iconic for a reason . It’s the only one I’ve used that doesn’t make my eyes burn or foggy and takes off all my makeup. It’s the perfect emollient texture and it feels so luxe! Obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by elemis in exchange for my review. I was super disappointed in this cleansing balm. I double-cleansed using this balm as a first step, and I still had foundation on my skin and mascara on my lashes. I experimented with different foundation and mascara and it still did not remove them completely. It stung my eyes and the rose scent is too heavy for my liking. It also got in my mouth a little and tasted toxic . I’ve never had that experience before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by elemis. The definitely product smells like roses. Follow the directions and use a warm washcloth to remove it instead of trying to wash it off. My skin felt soft and supple after using . full review on tiktok @Tyler.Miche

reviews.review_title: First time trying a cleansing balm like this!

The smell is AMAZING, the consistency is like a solid face oil, and what I noticed is that you have to warm it up for like 10 seconds and massage it on to your face for like 30 seconds to really remove your makeup. I was not a fan of the consistency because I have combo skin but for a dry skin one, this will probably be a lot better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Offered by Elemis. This cleanser has a beautiful scent and feels luxurious. I only use a small amount, and it can totally remove my face makeup and leaves my skin clean, soft with a beautiful glow, it’s worth the splurge!

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love how hydrating and gentle this is on my skin. It removes makeup really well and rinses well too- it makes my skin feel clean and soft. So glad I added this to my skincare routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Elemis Pro Collagen Cleansing Balm does wonders and I see why it’s such a trendy product on socials right now! It effectively removes full coverage makeup - in seconds - melting away impurities, excess oils, and dirt. It leaves my skin feeling clean but not squeaky clean and it emulsifies and washes away easily. There’s not a heavy scent and this has been working great on my acne prone and slightly sensitive skin. I love the texture of this one - it’s unlike any I’ve tried so far and I love how you don’t need much, so it will last you longer than most (of course also depending on how much makeup you wear). I’m a mom of 3 in her late 20’s and taking care of my skin went to a whole other level at 25, realizing I was going to start needing anti aging care if I wanted to keep youthful looking skin so I’m happy to have found another unique addition to my skincare regimen!

reviews.review_text: As someone with sensitive skin, I often struggle to find a makeup remover that cleanses thoroughly without causing irritation. The balm has a rich, luxurious texture that turns into a silky oil upon application. You only need a small amount, which I massage onto my face. It emulsifies well with water, making it easy to rinse off. The light scent adds to the overall pleasant experience. However, the packaging advises against using it on the eyes, which is a bit disappointing for removing stubborn mascara. Despite this, I would definitely consider repurchasing based on the positive results I've experienced.

I love how this cleansing balm has the most relaxing scents of lavender and eucalyptus - my partner loves smelling my face after I wash it. My face is guaranteed to feel soft and hydrated after this 1st cleanse. Yes, this balm is pricey, but I highly recommend it because it is effective and a little product goes a long way! Those with allergies or sensitivities, the balm contains essential oils, fragrance, almond oil, oat oil, coconut oil and wheat germ oil

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Discover the essence of Elemis' popular cleansing balm in a fragrance-free version, gentle for the delicate eye area and suitable for all skin types, even sensitive. This special edition maintains the renowned 3-in-1 formula that effortlessly removes makeup, dirt, and impurities for a radiant complexion.  This balm, free of mineral oil, indulges the skin with nourishing ingredients, effectively dissolving makeup like a cleansing oil and moisturizing like a cleansing milk. It excels at removing stubborn waterproof mascara and liquid lipsticks, leaving the eyes feeling refreshed and the skin soft. Enriched with a blend of moisturizing oils high in fatty acids, such as elderberry oil with its antioxidant benefits, it boosts the skin's glow. Infused with Optimega oil, a powerful blend of wheat germ and oat oil, it strengthens the skin's barrier to prevent moisture loss, revealing a youthful and radiant look. This anti-aging cleanser also aids in reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, enhancing a smoother and more radiant complexion.

reviews.review_text: The Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm is a luxurious and effective addition to any skincare routine. Its rich, creamy texture melts upon application, transforming into a soothing oil that deep cleanses without stripping the skin of its natural oils. Infused with a blend of starflower, elderberry, and optimega oils, along with Padina Pavonica, the balm provides an anti-aging boost, promoting a youthful and radiant complexion.
